AnomaliesExpected.PsychicRitualDef_AESum.label: provoke strange lake
AnomaliesExpected.PsychicRitualDef_AESum.description: Use a psychic pulse to distort the fabric of reality, resulting in the formation of a crimson lake in the ground somewhere in the local area.
AnomaliesExpected.PsychicRitualDef_AESum.outcomeDescription: Use a psychic pulse to distort the fabric of reality, resulting in the formation of a crimson lake in the ground somewhere in the local area.

AnomaliesExpected.PsychicRitualDef_AEAsk.label: asking Provider
AnomaliesExpected.PsychicRitualDef_AEAsk.description: Utilize prayer and the offering of items for asking Provider deity for resources.
AnomaliesExpected.PsychicRitualDef_AEAsk.outcomeDescription: The ritual summons items of the same type as those sacrificed and placed within the Provider Box. The yield is influenced by the quantity of the sacrifice, the quality of the ritual performance, and the level of research progress.

AnomaliesExpected.PsychicRitualDef_AESum.label: draw snow army
AnomaliesExpected.PsychicRitualDef_AESum.description: Create a psychic pulse which will draw a distant group of Snow Army towards your local area. They attack almost anyone that they see immediately. You can capture them for study or extract ice crystals from their corpses.
AnomaliesExpected.PsychicRitualDef_AESum.outcomeDescription: Create a psychic pulse which will draw a distant group of Snow Army towards your local area.
